choices: Jess stops and gives Emily a turn
Jess keeps growing to a mile!!!!!
11.content:
Jessica loved being tall. She loved having legs that every girl in school
envied. But most of all she loved her secret ability to make herself
grow. Only her younger sister Emily knew about it, but today Emily
was in for a surprise.... Jess had found that her powers had vastly
increased, and she was about to get bigger than ever!

Sitting by the pool with Emily by her side, Jess, sporting a new
purple bikini, was ready to show Emily her new found power....

" hey Emily, wanna see somthing cool?", jess purred with a grin.

" uh oh, Emily said. " here we go again..."

With that, both sisters stood up. Jess barely began to think about
growing when she started to get bigger! Soon she was 7ft tall then
8ft then 9ft then 10ft! This was her usual limit.

" alright jess you're twice my size. Can I go now? "

" mmm not yet.... I'm not done! "

suddenly Jessica started growing again!!! 15ft, 20ft, 30ft, 50ft!!!
She had never gotten this big before but she waned to be
even BIGGER!!!!!!!!!!!
11.title: BIG sister

choices: She reaches her limit, 10 feet tall, and is unable to surpass it as Jessica had.
She grows to 50 feet tall, and is now the same height as Jessica herself.
She manages to outgrow her sister, shooting up to a massive 100 feet tall!
111.content:
As Jessica reached 50 feet tall, she placed her hands on her hips and smirked down at her sister.

"So sis, how do you like me now?" she said in a taunting voice

Emily simply took a step back in fear. This made Jessica begin laughing.

"Aw, are you scared little sis? Tell you what. To be fair, I'll give you a chance to try and grow yourself before I start having my fun! Who knows, maybe your powers have increased just as much as mine!"

Without saying a word, Emily began focusing on using her own growth powers. She started to grow rapidly until...
111.title: Emily's turn to grow!

choices: It works and she grows to Emily's height
It works and she grows bigger than Emily
It doesn't work: Jessica is still 50ft
1113.content:
Jessica was confident that her sister would be able to even each half of her height. She still had a smug look on her face as she saw her sister suddenly grow. Her growth started up faster than Jessica's, but Jessica didn't think it would be that long before Emily stopped.

She saw Emily reach up a height of 25 feet and Jessica began to slightly worry.

Emily was now reaching up to Jessica's eye level, but quickly surpassed her. Suddenly, Jessica was looking up at Emily as she continued to grow in her green bikini.

This time, Jessica took a step back as Emily's growing body quickly took the space of where she was before. Emily's growth came to a halt at 100ft. Emily still had her eyes closed from focusing her growth and didn't realize how big she had gotten. Jessica looked up in awe as her sister opened her eyes and looked a bit confused for a second. Emily looked down and saw her 'big' sister now only reach up to her hips.

Emily now had an arrogant look on her face as she said, "You're right sis, my powers have gotten stronger....much stronger!"

Jessica now had an irritated look on her face. She couldn't believe that her sister not only surpassed her, but grow almost double her height!

"This must be a mistake," Jessica mumbled to herself as she decided to focus again on growing.
1113.title: Outgrowing Jessica

choices: Jess finally stops, and Emily attempts to catch up
11132.content:
Was Jess upset? Well, after growing larger than
she ever had before, she watched her little
sister grow double even her size to 100ft tall.
So yeah, she wasn't happy.

Emily wasn't helpIng by teasing her.
" Who's the BIG sister now Jess? You look
so small ", she laughed. " Come on tiny! Is that
As big as you can get? "

Jess had had enough. " I'll show that little
brat what big looks like ... "

Jess focused all her thoughts on growing bigger.
She was surprised to find that her anger was actually
intensifying her thoughts. Jess slowly grew to 60ft
in size.

" Bigger... " she said under her breath. As if
her body heard her, she felt her growth speed up.
Now she was 80ft above the ground, and still growing.

Emily noticed her sisters quickening of growth,
and began to get a bit worried. " Uh oh... "

" Bigger... Bigger... Bigger... ", Jess said.
She opened her eyes to see that she had matched
Emily's 100ft. But Jess wanted more. Much, much more...

" Well Jess, I guess we tied ", Emily said,
hoping to calm her sister down to stop her from getting
any bigger.

Jess looked at her body, admiring how good she
looked at this size. Imagine how much her boyfriend Jake
would it.

Emily had always enjoyed growing, but Jess
loved it. More than anything. " I'm so big... ", she
thought to herself. " This is so great. I never thought
I'd ever grow this much... ". Jess looked at Emily.
" But why should she get to be as big as me? "

Jess tried to fight her desires... but to no avail.
" Who does that little brat think she is? ", Jess thought.
" I'm the big sister after all. I should be the biggest.
a little more growth couldn't hurt... Or a lot... ".
Jess giggled. " Or a ton... I'll get so big she won't
know what to do! ".

" No Emily, we didn't tie. " Jess said.

Emily was really nervous now. " Wh- what do
ya mean Jess? You really shouldn't worry about it.
We're really really big.... "

Jess laughed. " Not yet I'm not. I'm big, yeah.
But really really big? I'm not even close to that.
I'm gonna grow and grow and grow, more and
more and more, bigger and bigger and BIGGER. "

" Jess, please... ", Emily pleaded.

" Sorry sis. ", Jess said with a smile. " But there's
only one BIG sister around here, and she's about
to take BIG to a whole new level! "

With that, Jess closed her eyes and started to
concentrate. Immediately, she began to grow again,
only this time, much faster.

Jess hit 110ft in no time, leaving Emily looking
up once again.

Jess willed her body bigger, and moaned as she
felt herself grow even faster. It only took 30 seconds
for her to reach 150ft, and after that she felt her
growth increase even further.

" Bigger... " Jess moaned. 175ft.

" Bigger... " 200ft.

" Bigger... Bigger... " 250ft.

Jess looked down at her long, red hot body,
getting horny as she saw herself take up more
and more space. That's when things really got going...

" I'm soooo Big! ", She groaned, passing 275ft.

" Bigger! ". 300ft.

" Bigger! ". 350ft.

" Bigger! Bigger! " 425ft.

Emily watched in a mixture of terror and awe
as her big sister grew bigger and bigger, wondering
just how big she would get.

" Bigger! Bigger! Bigger! ", Jess yelled.
At 500ft, she was now larger than Godzilla.
But still she wanted to grow...

" Bigger! Bigger! Bigger! Bigger! " 750ft.

Jess was now in overdrive. Watching her
Body get endlessly bigger only turned her on
even more, making her grow faster and faster.
She rubbed her hands up and down her massive
self, practically climaxing from seeing her feet
grow larger than buildings.

" Bigger! Bigger! Bigger! Bigger!
Bigger! Bigger! Bigger! Bigger! " 1000ft.

Jess had lost it.

" Bigger bigger bigger bigger bigger
Bigger bigger bigger bigger bigger!!!! "

She blew past 1500ft, moaning and yelling all the louder.

" BIGGER! BIGGER! BIGGER! " 2500ft.

Jess kept growing, faster and faster and faster.
She grew hundreds of feet in mere seconds.
Still she wanted more. Her body kept growing, hotter
and hotter, bigger and bigger....

" BIGGER! " 3000ft.

" BIGGER! " 3500ft.

" BIGGER! BIGGER! BIGGER!
BIGGER BIGGER BIGGER BIGGER
BIGGER BIGGER BIGGER
BIIIIIIIIIIIIIGGGGGGGGEEEEEERRRRRRRR!!!!!! "

Jess grew to 2 miles in size.
11132.title: Big sister? No, BIGGER Big sister.

choices: Stops for now, and Jess shoots off again!
Keeps growing past that piddly size. 4 miles minimum!
111321.content:
Jess wanted to keep growing. She really did. But at 2 miles in height versus her sister at a piddly 100 feet, now was the opportune time to gloat and rub it in Emily's face before letting herself grow even bigger. Jess bent down and looked at her itty bitty sister and then said, "Ooh, I could just get even bigger, little shrimp. But because you're my little sister, and I love you, I'll stop here for the moment. It would hardly be sporting of your big, BIG sister to not let you have a chance to catch up a bit.

"If a meager 100 feet is all you can do, Emily, then you leave me sorely disappointed. I dare you to grow as big as me. Right now. I want to see the look on your face as I beat you yet again - ha, that is, if I'll be able to make it out as I grow bigger..."

It was on now. Emily's temper was now boiling over. Not only did her sister completely put her to shame, she had to shove it in her face and dare her to grow as big as she was now. And yet, she found herself agreeing with one thing her older sister had said. 100 feet really was piddly. Why was she ever satisfied with such a teeny, tiny height? She was bigger than she had ever tried growing before, but boundaries were made to be pushed beyond. She was going to beat her sister so hard she'd be scared to even grow a quarter of an inch, and then Emily would have the prize of being able to show David just how awesomely big she could be to secure his heart from her sister.

Oh yes, steal the title of biggest girl ever AND the boy they both had a huge crush on. Emily liked that idea very much.

"We'll see, Jessica! But you're right. I am tiny. Why was I ever even remotely satisfied with a mere 100 feet? I'm coming for your size, sister, and then I'm going to make you regret looking at David or even thinking you could possibly beat me!" Emily yelled. Jess chortled deeply and replied, "Tough talk, bug. But I don't think you've got what it takes to beat me!"

Emily concentrated hard, gritting her teeth. And then she exploded in size. She came up to 500 feet, saw it, and then waved it goodbye. Soon she was up to Jess' hip, and then her impressive chest. (though Emily's was better, or so she believed) Eventually she matched Jess' height of 2 miles and...
111321.title: Jess finally stops, and Emily attempts to catch up

choices: Emily manages to catch up and even exceed her sister even as she grows.
Jess just can't be caught up to, she's growing too fast!
111322.content:
2 miles was nice...while it lasted. But Jess was determined for bigger, better sizes. It was a simple, lovely cycle, this growth: the bigger she grew, the bigger she wanted to grow, and the bigger she got. She grew past 5 miles in a heartbeat, then 20 miles moaning loudly all the way.

"If you're so fine with being a 100 foot tall microbe, dear sister, then be my guest. I'm certainly not complaining... And you know what I always say: I can never be BIG enough!" Jess said, laughing even as she grew to 100 miles. She cared little that she could still somehow breathe up here, all she cared about was growing bigger and bigger and BIGGER. Her hands worked themselves up and down her flaming hot body furiously. She was tempted to just tear her already skimpy bikini off and let the universe see its new, naked goddess' glory, but it was more convenient just to keep it on in the miniscule chance she absolutely went insane and wanted to return to her original size. Like that would ever happen!

Emily was infuriated with Jess' words, but was a bit too scared at the moment to challenge her older sister. She had since given up wondering when Jess would stop or how big she would get. Like this, Jess in all likelihood wasn't going to stop until she hit her limit. And she feared such a thing didn't exist.

But hold on, if Jess had no limit as to how big she could get, then surely Emily could get at least that big too! Emily wouldn't let Jess take David away from her!

...However, thinking of beating her sister was one thing. When Jess was now bigger than the Moon at 3000 miles and still growing, catching up....would take some time. If it could be done at all what with how quickly she was growing. Still, Emily concentrated and started growing again herself. She wasn't going to go down without a fight.

"Ooh! The sub-atomic munchkin is finally trying to put up a challenge, is she? How cute! But it's too little, too late, Emily! I'm the biggest girl ever, and I'm only growing bigger and BIGGER!" Jess teased, and it seemed as though the now Earth sized beauty was on to something with her words...
111322.title: Jess gets BIGGER!!!

Jessica kept on growing. It was an incredible feeling. And

Finally she stop, a solid 100 feet tall. Emily barely reached her ankle.

Suddenly Jess felt warm. And aroused. She let out a moan.
She was growing again!!!

12.content:
Emily loved her life, except for one thing.... Her height.
It especially bothered her that Jessica, her older sister had 8 inches
on her. But that was about to change....

It was a hot summer day, and Emily and jessica had every intention

Just as Jessica slipped into the pool, Emily quickly produced a small
bottle And took a sip. She began to feel tingly... But it worked!!! She
was growing!!!

Emily moaned and squirmed as her body expanded in every direction,
pushing her past five and a half feet. She continued to grow, reaching

Does Jessica see her? Or does Emily grow alone?

123.content:
Emily looked down and saw that her growth was still going, which only brought more excitement to her. She quickly passed 7ft as she felt the expansion pressing against her swim suit, which seem to slowly, but surely, grow along with her. As 8ft come and gone, she could now looked past the fence surrounding their house. Luckily for her, no one else seem to be in their back-yards.

Soon, Emily reached 10 ft. Their pool's depth was 10 ft itself and now, she had the ability to go to the bottom and tip top herself to stay above the water. Her potion had almost doubled her height. 'I can't believe it worked so well...' Emily thought to herself as she looked down at everything around her.

"EMILY!! What happened?!" Emily looked at the pool and saw Jessica with her jaw dropped. Emily smirked as she took a dip in the pool herself and go to where her sister as at. Her sister was standing around the 5ft depth of the pool and her head barely stood afloat. Meanwhile, Emily's body was exposed from the hip-up. Emily looked down at Jessica and took a quick step back. "Guess you're the little sister now, Jessica," she teased.
123.title: 10 foot Emily

choices: She stops at 30ft, and starts to get worried...

She let out a small moan, and then a loud

Jess was looking at her " little " sisters large,

Emily was sweating intensely, either from

How does Emily react?

12313.content:
Once the initial shock of being 25 feet tall wore off, and surprisingly quickly at that, Emily smiled and giggled slightly in thought even as she continued to grow. Sure, she hadn't planned on growing 25, no, 30 feet tall. But...why shouldn't she have? Being 40 feet tall is awesome! 50 is even better, and some would say classic!

But she didn't want classic! She {i]wanted {b}MORE{/b}! And indeed, her body was happy to continue to pile on the feet. Pretty soon even 100 feet was but a distant memory. "Ooh... Getting so big... Don't stop now, my body... In fact... Don't stop for ANYTHING!!!" Emily screamed, forcing Jessica to cover her ears from the sheer volume. Emily's body seemed to happily comply, if not take that as indication to grow even faster as she rocketed past 400 feet in less time it took her to grow to 25 feet. Her hand glided down her stomach and buried itself behind her bikini bottom. She was too in sweet, ecstasy-filled blissful nirvana to even remotely care about what she was doing to herself in plain sight. Let them see! There was not a damn thing around for miles nearly as smoking hot as her, not even her sister! Any who were disgusted or appalled by it were simply jealous they weren't a hot, growing teen giantess - no, goddess!

By now, Jessica herself was admittedly getting turned on at the sight of her sister growing bigger and bigger and bigger. Not because it was her sister or having any love for her beyond that of the standard unconditional love between close relatives, sisters in this case. No. Jessica was getting turned on because she was imagining herself in her sister's position...and even bigger than that, of course. But fantasizing about being over 3000 feet was one thing. Jessica wanted the real deal. She wanted to at least make Emily seem as small compared to herself as she was compared to Emily right now, preferably with MUCH greater disparity in Jessica's favor. She could practically taste being 100's of miles tall as Emily rapidly approached and passed the 1 mile mark.

But will Jessica find the trick to get that big minimum, or will Emily just keep on growing like the Energizer bunny of growth all by her lonesome?
12313.title: She keeps growing, and wants more!

1252322.content:
Emily looked on in glee as she now floated in space, her solar flare hot body much too big to be bound by Earth's gravity. Or apparently any physical constraint that should have possibly stopped her like, say, breathing. But was Emily concerned, or worried whatsoever about it? Her spoken words of, "Oh wow, I guess air is for little people now...not for a hot, growing goddess like me... Tee-hee!" suggested 'no'.

All that Emily was concerned with, all that she wanted, she was getting as she grew another 1000 miles to 6000 miles tall. She had long outgrown the Moon; it wasn't even sufficient for use as a seat for her massive and glorious behind any more. Not that she had destroyed it or anything. Where was the fun in outgrowing something only to destroy it? By the time the teeniest, tiniest part of her body would outgrow something it wouldn't be worth the effort of destroying...or locating for that matter. Just the way she liked it.

Emily moaned in pleasure as she finally grew as large as the Earth itself. But was she done now? Hardly. All this growing and growing and growing was turning the teen goddess on more and more. And the more turned on she became, the BIGGER she wanted to grow. And she was already more turned on than 1000 women have or would ever be in their entire lives - combined. Her bikini bottom that had grown with her, not that she would have minded if it didn't, became darker in the front as her love juices soaked through the ever expanding fabric. Her bikini top was revealing two similarly darkened spots as her nipples leaked gallons of milk just from the orgasmic pleasure of growing over 9000 miles in height, though to her it was only just a tiny amount of leakage, especially should she wish to unleash a true Milky Way. One that wasn't made of stars, but could soon prove to be just as large as the galaxy that held that name which she resided in...for now.

10,000 and then 20,000 miles passed by without a second glance. Emily was still growing. And STILL wanted to just keep on growing bigger and bigger and bigger. As she passed 50,000 miles in height, more than 8 times bigger than the Earth, she felt...
